sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>This fix script will update assigned_to field mapping. It will set the lookup_table_name and lookup_column_name.</description> <name>Set Lookup Col & Table for assigned_to</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[var fieldMapGR = new GlideRecord('sn_int_common_field_map'); fieldMapGR.addQuery('internal_field', 'assigned_to'); fieldMapGR.query(); fieldMapGR.setValue('lookup_table_name', 'sys_user'); fieldMapGR.setValue('lookup_column_name', 'email'); fieldMapGR.updateMultiple();]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2021-01-07 08:26:39</sys_created_on> <sys_id>7fd4cd7153e52010fed0ddeeff7b1275</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Set Lookup Col & Table for assigned_to</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="">75f8d53373fe330001073cf2c4f6a7b6</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="">75f8d53373fe330001073cf2c4f6a7b6</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_7fd4cd7153e52010fed0ddeeff7b1275</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2021-01-20 10:26:41</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Set Lookup Col & Table for assigned_to
